subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Synchronized Swimming
lead_paragraph: The day in sports included John Daly’s latest fashion statement before the British Open, the 10th stage of the Tour de France and preparations for the world swimming championships in Shanghai.
